name: Teague Silverthorne
coverLetter: I have about three years of trim experience in both indoor and outdoor grows. Marijuana as a medicine is my passion. Im a very meticulous trimmer im quick and efficient. I am completely available for work for the rest of the year all I would need is a place to either park a van or pitch a tent.
contact: Feel free to contact me through call or txt @ 307-370-3585 or email @ teague_silverthorne@yahoo.com
